verbose_text: The increased number of apoptotic cardiomyocytes and the production of TNF-alpha and IL-1beta were associated with the elevated expression of TLR4 and enhanced NF-kappaB activation in the cardiomyocyte A/R model, which could be inhibited by resveratrol administered shortly after the onset of reoxygenation in cardiomyocytes.
evidence: IL-1beta were associated with the elevated expression of TLR4 and enhanced NF-kappaB
